name: Pinball Hoops
description:
Pinball Hoops..
Time to shoot some Hoops Pinball style.
Become the Pinball Hoops Master, by timing shots, and ricochets to sink hoops.
Collect Coins to:
-Unlock new Balls.
-Continue your score.
Features:
-Endless game play with random hoop positions, and moving hoops.
-Simple tap controls.
-Game Centre Leaderboard.
